quote_first: ‘It is now 11.30. The door to this room is shut, and will remain shut, barring emergencies, until 12.00. I am authorised to inform you that we are now under battle orders.
title: Singularity Sky
author: Charles Stross

quote_last: to a minute as you said…"
title: Far from the madding crowd

quote_first: “Thank-you,” said C.B. quietly; but as he hung up his face was grim. In a few minutes he would have to break it to John that, although they had braved such dredful perils dring the earlier part of the night they had, after all, failed to save Christina. Beddows had abjured Satan at a little after
quote_last: . By about eighteen minutes the Canon had beaten them to it again.“
title: To the Devil a Daughter
author: Dennis Wheatley

quote_first: This time it was Kumiko. The wall clock said 11.30.
title: The Wind-up Bird Chronicle
author: Haruki Murakami
